Question
========

When two quantitative variables do **not** correlate with each other, there exists between those variables at least **no**

Answerlist
----------

* Causal relationship
* Linear relationship
* Strong relationship

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Causal relationship: Incorrect
* Linear relationship: Correct
* Strong relationship: Incorrect
